title: Mini-Ep 201: Back to the Future
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 201: Back to the Future
itunes:subtitle: Kate prepares to take a flight with new airport self-care rituals and Doree reveals she’s reading a (not-so) surprising book series and planning a fun book event. Then, listeners ask for help planning for the future, share opinions on bra straps, and s...
description:
Kate prepares to take a flight with new airport self-care rituals and Doree reveals she’s reading a (not-so) surprising book series and planning a fun book event. Then, listeners ask for help planning for the future, share opinions on bra straps, and seek recs for summer makeup that won’t slide off your face. 


To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach us at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.

Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything we mention on the show.

Follow us on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums). 

Sign up for the newsletter! At forever35podcast.com/newsletter
